pages.text: The Mechanical Press, when paired with a Basin, will cause items in the basin to be compacted. This includes all 2x2 and 3x3 recipes where all of the ingredients are the same item. $(ponder)
Fluid Honey and Chocolate can be compacted into an equivalent item using the same method.$(br2)$(italics)Note that the Press cannot make plates. Use the $(hammer)$(italics) for that.
